PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-06172011-06-13,  CH,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectShares of Canadian Satellite Radio Holdings Inc **CBC**
PrecisOrder authorizing the CANADIAN BROACASTING CORPORATION a) to acquire, hold and dispose of any class of shares of Canadian Satellite Radio Holdings Inc. and b) to distribute and market its programming services outside Canada via the Sirius, XM or successor satellite radio services.
AttachmentsAttachment
